text: Steve King (born July 4, 1941) is an American businessman and Republican Party activist. He is the founder of King Capital LLC, an equity investment and real estate company. He is a former FBI agent. In 1988, he campaigned unsuccessfully for the Republican U.S. Senate nomination in Wisconsin. In July 2017, President Donald Trump nominated King to be the next United States Ambassador to the Czech Republic. This nomination was confirmed by the U.S. Senate on October 5, 2017. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:American political activists Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Indianapolis Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Politicians from Wisconsin Category:Businesspeople from Indianapolis Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Stephen B. King
